application.name: leastsquaressolution
application.brief: Produces a least squares solution for an nth degree polynomial using the registration data produced by jitterreg.

parameter.name: REGISTRATIONDATA
parameter.brief: File that contains the registration data generated by jitterreg.

parameter.name: COEFFICIENTTO
parameter.brief: Output file that holds the coefficients. The output will be from highest order coeff to lowest order coeff.

parameter.name: RESIDUALTO
parameter.brief: Output file that holds the residuals.

parameter.name: TOLERANCE
parameter.brief: The tolerance that determines which points will be excluded based on the goodness of fit of the registration.

parameter.name: DEGREE
parameter.brief: The order of polynomial to solve for.

parameter.name: MAXTIME
parameter.brief: The time, in seconds, that the last line was taken. The minimum is .0026 seconds it takes for a 2250 line image to be taken plus the time it takes to take 60 checklines.
